info.name: Stylish Glass 2.0
info.description:
Add some style to your Stylish page!  A customizable color scheme with background images and a transparent,
glass look.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 2.0:
==============
- Modifies all pages under Userstyles domain
- Modifies the scrollbar to minimalist block
- Modifies the vanilla Stylish site after 2017 redesign
- Functional on Windows OS
- Functional with Chrome Web Browser
